books.title: Edward II
books.author: Christopher Marlowe
books.summary: Outraged by the favoritism shown by King Edward II to a close confidant, his court plots against him.

books.title: The Black Arrow
books.author: Robert Louis Stevenson
books.summary: During the War of the Roses, a young knight must rescue his lady and find out who killed his father.

books.title: An Autobiography
books.author: Theodore Roosevelt
books.summary: The autobiography of American President Theodore Roosevelt.

books.title: Eminent Victorians
books.author: Lytton Strachey
books.summary: Four witty and biting biographies of Victorians that take aim at the moral superiority of their subject’s time.

books.title: Five Children and It
books.author: E. Nesbit
books.summary: Five children encounter an ancient magical creature who grants them wishes—all of which go comically wrong.

books.title: Indiscretions of Archie
books.author: P. G. Wodehouse
books.summary: When Englishman Archie Moffam makes a complaint about his room to the owner of the New York hotel, his life is changed forever.

books.title: A Midsummer Night’s Dream
books.author: William Shakespeare
books.summary: This comedy follows four lovers and a thespian who become bewitched by fairies.

books.title: The Charwoman’s Shadow
books.author: Lord Dunsany
books.summary: A young nobleman becomes a magician to secure his sister’s marriage.

books.title: Soldiers’ Pay
books.author: William Faulkner
books.summary: American soldiers returning from the First World War meet a scarred and lethargic comrade and help him reach home.

books.title: The Return
books.author: Walter de la Mare
books.summary: After visiting a graveyard, a man finds his appearance has mysteriously changed.

books.title: The Interesting Narrative of the Life of Olaudah Equiano
books.author: Olaudah Equiano
books.summary: An autobiography of an ex-slave in the mid 1700s.

books.title: The Mystery of 31, New Inn
books.author: R. Austin Freeman
books.summary: A detective investigates a potentially spurious will and a man’s mysterious death.

books.title: The National Being
books.author: George William Russell
books.summary: An Irish writer presents his vision of an independent Irish nation.

books.title: The Practice and Theory of Bolshevism
books.author: Bertrand Russell
books.summary: Bertrand Russell travels to post-revolutionary Russia to see if Bolshevism achieves its communist aspirations.

books.title: Metamorphoses
books.author: Ovid
books.summary: A collection of Greek and Roman myths that involve various forms of transformation.

books.title: A Woman of No Importance
books.author: Oscar Wilde
books.summary: A mother’s secretive past clashes with high society when her son is offered an irresistible position with a charismatic nobleman.

books.title: Triplanetary
books.author: E. E. Smith
books.summary: In a universe where all powerful alien races influence the fates of worlds, a war erupts between the Triplanetary League of the inner solar system, pirates led by a mysterious and malicious scientist, and technologically advanced aliens.

books.title: Jack Keefe Stories
books.author: Ring Lardner
books.summary: A boastful, nearly illiterate major league pitcher writes a series of letters home detailing the goings-on in his life and career.

books.title: Unspoken Sermons
books.author: George MacDonald
books.summary: George MacDonald presents a set of interlocking sermons designed to shape the perception and life of the Christian disciple.

books.title: South!
books.author: Ernest Shackleton
books.summary: A British expedition sets off to cross Antarctica, but when their ship is wrecked they have to face a long struggle for survival.
